casebody.data:
XPO LOGISTICS, INC.
v.
ANIS 395A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2017 Brian D. Boone, Mark T. Calloway, Michael Hoernlein, Julian W. DuRant, Attorneys at Law, Charlotte, for Anis, Fouzi. David C. Wright, III, Douglas M. Jarrell, Brian L. Church, Attorneys at Law, Charlotte, for XPO Logistics, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of October 2017 by Defendant to Withdraw Appeal:

"Motion Allowed with Prejudice by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of October 2017."
